players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I saw Charlie last night and he was alone. Something doesn't add up."
Bob: "Charlie was acting suspiciously last night, I saw him talking to someone in the shadows."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
